justification: Acknowledges B needs wins but misreads priorities: B prefers consistent workhorse RBs and already has big-play WRs. Offering an injured Tier 5 RB as a “floor upgrade” is inaccurate, and swapping B’s solid RB/possession WR for a boom-bust WR undermines B’s needs. Rationale is generic and incorrect, making acceptance unlikely and the proposal internally inconsistent with B’s context.
